entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
